types.html:
à la turque

  1. (Turkish coffee) prepared by boiling ground coffee in a pot
    café à la turque ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
  2. (Turkish toilet) used while squatting
    chiottes à la turque ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
trans: prepared by boiling ground coffee in a pot

title: à la turque
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /a la tyʁk/
